docs.title: Local-First Tools
docs.text:
A collection of privacy-friendly web tools that run entirely in your browser.

No uploads. No tracking. No server-side processing.

docs.title: Why local-first?
docs.text:
Most “online tools” upload your files to a server. These tools don’t.

  • Your data never leaves your device
  • Everything runs client-side
  • Works offline after the first load
  • No accounts, no cookies, no analytics

docs.title: 🖼️ Image
docs.text: • Metadata Remover – Remove EXIF data from images locally

docs.title: 📊 Social
docs.text:
• Instagram Stats – Analyze followers and following from your Instagram data export

More tools coming soon.

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Local-First Tools is an open collection of small, useful web tools built by davidalvarezp.

The goal is simple: create tools that respect user privacy and run entirely on the client side.

Source code is available on GitHub.

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
This website does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data.

All tools run entirely in your browser. No files are uploaded. No tracking, analytics, or cookies are used.

docs.title: Image Metadata Remover
docs.text:
Remove EXIF metadata from images locally in your browser.

This tool does not upload your images. Everything runs on your device.

Drag & drop images here or click to select

docs.title: Instagram Stats
docs.text:
Analyze your Instagram followers and following locally using your official data export.

Your ZIP file is processed entirely in your browser.

docs.title: How it works
docs.text:
1. Request your data from Instagram
  2. Download the ZIP file
  3. Upload it here
  4. Get clean, downloadable results
